results.title: Simvastatin Ameliorates Liver Fibrosis via Mediating Nitric Oxide Synthase in Rats with Non-Alcoholic Steatohepatitis-Related Liver Fibrosis
results.text_hl: Nelson A et al. considered that monotherapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ does not seem to be an effective treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@.

results.title: Statins for non-alcoholic fatty liver disease and non-alcoholic steatohepatitis.
results.text_hl: One of the trials was a pilot trial in which 16 participants with biopsy-proven @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@ were randomised to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg (n = 10) or placebo (n = 6) once daily for 12 months.

citations.NLM: Eslami L, Merat S, Malekzadeh R, Nasseri-Moghaddam S, Aramin H. Statins for non-alcoholic fatty liver disease and non-alcoholic steatohepatitis. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2013 Dec 27;(12):CD008623. PMID: 24374462

results.title: Restoration of liver sinusoidal cell phenotypes by statins improves portal hypertension and histology in rats with NASH
results.text_hl: In addition, neither @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ nor @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ treatment caused any difference in the gene expression of @GENE_PECAM1 @GENE_29583 @@@CD31@@@ or @GENE_EDN1 @GENE_24323 @@@ET-1@@@ in @GENE_FCGR2B @GENE_289211 @@@CD32@@@+ cells of @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@ animals (Fig. 3C).

citations.NLM: Bravo M, Raurell I, Hide D, Fernández-Iglesias A, Gil M, Barberá A, Salcedo MT, Augustin S, Genescà J, Martell M. Restoration of liver sinusoidal cell phenotypes by statins improves portal hypertension and histology in rats with NASH Sci Rep. 2019 Dec 27;9(1):20183. PMID: 31882668
